name: squeezy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made of a material that makes it easy to squeeze (= press from all sides): You can buy tomato ketchup in a squeezy bottle. a squeezy rubber ball
More examplesFewer examplesHe has one of those squeezy executive stress balls on his desk.She helped herself to some mayonnaise from a squeezy bottle.Souvenirs are available from the aquarium gift shop, including squeezy sharks, toy submarines, and model boats.
